author: Salvatore Calabrese
description: Fresh ginger adds a hint of spice which combines well with raspberry fruit in this crowd-pleasing vodka-based cocktail which is freshened by a dash of limoncello.
name: Red Earl (Salvatore's recipe)
recipeIngredient: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE ginger and then raspberries in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
